section.title: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager backup driver
section.para: The IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (TSM) backup driver enables performing volume backups to a TSM server.

The TSM client should be installed and configured on the machine running the cinder-backup service. See the IBM Tivoli Storage Manager Backup-Archive Client Installation and Userâ€™s Guide for details on installing the TSM client.
To enable the IBM TSM backup driver, include the following option in cinder.conf:
The following configuration options are available for the TSM backup driver.

table.title: Description of IBM Tivoli Storage Manager backup driver configuration options

entry.para: (Boolean) Enable or Disable compression for backups
(String) TSM password for the running username
(String) Volume prefix for the backup id when backing up to TSM

section.para: This example shows the default options for the TSM backup driver.
section.screen: backup_tsm_volume_prefix = backup backup_tsm_password = password backup_tsm_compression = True
